title: Skin Lesion Classification and Diagnosis: Utilizing Hybrid Deep Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Providing content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, utilizing real-time feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners identify major types of skin lesions (e.g., melanoma, basal cell carcinoma) and their clinical features with 80% accuracy
Learners explain the operational principles of a combined ResUNet and ACO algorithm model
Learners apply image segmentation evaluation metrics (e.g., Dice coefficient, Jaccard index) to practical cases
Learners perform classification tasks with 90% accuracy using lesion image analysis tools provided in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
